name: pod
desc: ðŸ«˜ A lightweight, modular dependency injection (DI) and inversion-of-control (IoC) library.

name: AbstractAutowirePodFactory
desc: Abstract base class for pod factories that support autowiring capabilities.

name: AbstractAutowirePodFactory.new
desc: Creates a new autowire-capable pod factory with optional parent factory.

name: applyAfterInitializationProcessing
desc: Applies post-processing to a pod instance after its initialization.

name: applyAfterInstantiationProcessing
desc: Applies post-processing to a pod instance after its instantiation.

name: applyBeforeInitializationProcessing
desc: Applies post-processing to a pod instance after its initialization.

name: applyBeforeInstantiationProcessing
desc: Applies post-processing to a pod instance before its initialization.

name: applyCustomPostProcessing
desc: Applies custom post-processing logic to an object from a PodProvider.

name: applyPodPropertyValues
desc: Applies property values to a pod instance based on its configuration.

name: applyPopulateValueProcessing
desc: Populates the values of a pod instance from pod-aware processors.

name: applyPropertyValues
desc: Applies property values to the pod instance.

name: applyPropertyValuesProcessing
desc: Determines the property values for a pod instance from pod-aware processors.

name: autowire
desc: Creates and autowires a new pod instance from a class.

name: autowireByName
desc: Performs autowiring by name for the pod instance.

name: autowireByType
desc: Performs autowiring by type for the pod instance.

name: autowirePod
desc: Performs autowiring on an existing pod instance.

name: checkDependencies
desc: Checks if all dependencies are satisfied for the pod instance.

name: clearSingletonCache
desc: Clear all cached singleton instances in this registry.

name: configurePod
desc: Configures a pod instance with factory-specific settings.

name: convertValueIfNecessary
desc: Converts a value to the target type if necessary using the conversion service.

name: copyConfigurationFrom
desc: Copies configuration from another factory.

name: create
desc: Creates a pod instance with the given name and definition.

name: createInstance
desc:
Creates a pod instance using the appropriate strategy (factory method,
constructor, or default instantiation).

name: createPod
desc: Creates and registers a pod from an existing instance.

name: destroyExistingPod
desc: Destroys an existing pod instance by invoking its destruction methods.

name: determineCandidateArguments
desc: Determines the candidate arguments for a pod instance.

name: doCreate
desc: Abstract method for creating pod instances that must be implemented by subclasses.

name: doGetObject
desc: Internal method to handle PodProvider unwrapping and instance retrieval.

name: doResolveDependency
desc:
Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses to resolve
dependencies according to the specific factory implementation.

name: getAllowCircularReferences
desc: Retrieves the current circular reference setting.

name: getAllowDefinitionOverriding
desc: Retrieves the current definition overriding setting.

name: getAllowRawInjection
desc: Retrieves the current raw injection despite wrapping setting.

name: getExecutableStrategy
desc: Executable Strategy

name: getUnsatisfiedNonSimpleProperties
desc:
Gets a map of property names to their types that are not satisfied
by existing property values and are not simple types.

name: ignoreDependencyInterface
desc:
Ignores the specified dependency interface and all its implementations
during autowiring.

name: ignoreDependencyType
desc: Ignores the specified dependency type during autowiring.

name: initializeExistingPod
desc:
Initializes an existing pod instance by applying post-processors
and calling initialization methods.

name: initializePod
desc: Initializes a pod instance by invoking its lifecycle methods.

name: instantiateUsingConstructor
desc: Instantiates a pod using constructor injection.

name: instantiateUsingFactoryMethod
desc: Instantiates a pod using a factory method defined in the pod definition.

name: isInterfaceIgnored
desc: Checks if the specified interface is ignored during dependency resolution.

name: isTypeIgnored
desc: Checks if the specified type is ignored during dependency resolution.

name: populate
desc: Populates a pod instance with property values and dependencies.

name: postProcessObjectFromPodProvider
desc: Retrieves the PodProvider backing a pod.

name: removeSingleton
desc: Remove the pod associated with name.

name: resolveBeforeInstantiation
desc:
Gives PodInstantiationProcessors a chance to return a proxy instead
of the target pod instance before instantiation.

name: resolveDependency
desc: Resolves a dependency based on the provided descriptor.

name: setAllowCircularReferences
desc: Allows or disallows circular references between pods.

name: setAllowDefinitionOverriding
desc: Allows or disallows overriding of pod definitions.

name: setAllowRawInjection
desc: Allows or disallows raw injection despite wrapping.

name: setExecutableStrategy
desc: Sets the executable strategy used by this factory.

name: setPropertyValue
desc: Sets a property value on the pod instance using reflection.

name: AbstractPodDefinition
desc: An abstract base class for pod definitions that extends PodDefinition.

name: AbstractPodDefinition.new
desc: Creates an AbstractPodDefinition with a given name and type.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getIsStale
desc: Returns whether this pod definition is stale.

name: getPodExpression
desc: Returns the PodExpression representing this podâ€™s creation logic.

name: hasDestroyMethod
desc:
Checks whether this pod definition defines a destroy method
with the given methodName.

name: instance
desc: The instance of the pod definition.

name: setIsStale
desc: Marks this pod definition as stale or not.

name: setPodExpression
desc: Attaches a PodExpression representing this podâ€™s creation logic.

name: AbstractPodFactory
desc:
Abstract base implementation of PodFactory that provides core functionality
for pod creation, management, and lifecycle handling in the Jetleaf framework.

name: AbstractPodFactory.new
desc:
Abstract base implementation of PodFactory that provides core functionality
for pod creation, management, and lifecycle handling in the Jetleaf framework.

name: STARTUP_STEP_INSTANTIATE_POD
desc: Constant used to denote the startup step for pod instantiation in the abstract pod provider.

name: addPodProcessor
desc: Registers a new pod-aware processor.

name: afterPrototypeCreation
desc: Removes a prototype pod from the creation tracking after creation completes.

name: beforePrototypeCreation
desc: Marks a prototype pod as being created to detect circular dependencies.

name: cacheMergedPodDefinition
desc: Caches a merged pod definition for a given pod name.

name: checkMergedPodDefinition
desc: Checks the merged pod definition for a given pod name.

name: cleanupAfterPodCreationFailure
desc: Cleans up after a pod creation failure.

name: clearMergedPodDefinition
desc: Clears the merged pod definition for a given pod name.

name: clearMetadataCache
desc: Clears the metadata cache for pods that are not eligible for caching.

name: containsDefinition
desc: Check if pod definition exists locally.

name: containsLocalPod
desc: Checks if a pod with the given name is registered locally in this factory.

name: containsPod
desc: Checks if a pod with the given name is registered in the factory.

name: convertIfNecessary
desc: Converts a pod instance to the required type if necessary.

name: copyConfigurationFrom
desc: Copies configuration from another factory.

name: destroyPod
desc: Destroy the given pod.

name: destroyScopedPod
desc: Destroys all pods in the specified scope.

name: doCreate
desc: Abstract method for creating pod instances that must be implemented by subclasses.

name: doGet
desc: Main template method for pod retrieval that implements the core resolution algorithm.

name: doGetObject
desc: Internal method to handle PodProvider unwrapping and instance retrieval.

name: evaluateExpression
desc: Evaluates a pod expression using the configured expression resolver.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a pod instance by its type with optional arguments.

name: getAliases
desc: Retrieves all aliases registered for the given primary name.

name: getApplicationStartup
desc:
Defines a contract for components that are aware of and can interact with
an ApplicationStartup strategy.

name: getConversionService
desc: Retrieves the currently assigned ConversionService.

name: getDefinition
desc:
Return the registered PodDefinition for the specified pod, allowing access
to its property values and constructor argument value (which can be
modified during pod factory post-processing).

name: getDefinitionByClass
desc: Returns the pod definition for the specified class type.

name: getLocalMergedPodDefinition
desc: Returns the locally cached merged pod definition if available and not stale.

name: getMergedPodDefinition
desc: Retrieves the merged pod definition for the specified pod name.

name: getNamedObject
desc: Retrieves a pod as a generic Object by its name with optional arguments.

name: getObject
desc: Retrieves a pod as a generic Object by its type with optional arguments.

name: getParentFactory
desc: Retrieves the parent factory in the hierarchy, if any.

name: getPod
desc: Retrieves a pod instance by its name with optional arguments.

name: getPodDestructionProcessors
desc: Returns a copy of all registered destruction-aware pod processors.

name: getPodExpressionResolver
desc: Retrieves the current expression resolver.

name: getPodInitializationProcessors
desc: Returns a copy of all registered initialization-aware pod processors.

name: getPodInstantiationProcessors
desc: Returns a copy of all registered instantiation-aware pod processors.

name: getPodProcessorCount
desc: Gets the number of registered pod-aware processors.

name: getPodProcessors
desc: Retrieves all registered pod-aware processors.

name: getPodSmartInstantiationProcessors
desc: Returns a copy of all registered smart instantiation-aware pod processors.

name: getRegisteredScope
desc: Retrieves a registered scope by name.

name: getRegisteredScopeNames
desc: Retrieves all registered scope names.

name: hasPodDestructionProcessors
desc: Returns true if there are any destruction pod post-processors registered.

name: hasPodInitializationProcessors
desc: Returns true if there are any initialization pod post-processors registered.

name: hasPodInstantiationProcessors
desc: Returns true if there are any instantiation pod post-processors registered.

name: hasPodProcessors
desc: Returns true if there are any pod post-processors registered.

name: hasPodSmartInstantiationProcessors
desc: Returns true if there are any smart instantiation pod post-processors registered.

name: hasStartedCreatingPod
desc: Checks if a pod has already been created.

name: isActuallyInCreation
desc: Check whether the specified singleton pod is actually in creation.

name: isCachePodMetadata
desc: Checks if pod metadata caching is enabled.

name: isCurrentlyCreatingPrototype
desc: Checks if a prototype pod is currently being created.

name: isNameInUse
desc: Checks if a pod name is already in use in this factory.

name: isPodEligibleForMetadataCaching
desc: Checks if a pod is eligible for metadata caching.

name: isPodProvider
desc: Checks if the specified pod name refers to a pod provider.

name: isPrototype
desc: Checks if the specified pod is configured as a prototype.

name: isSingleton
desc: Checks if the specified pod is configured as a singleton.

name: isTypeMatch
desc: Checks if the pod with the specified name matches the given type.

name: markPodAsCreated
desc: Marks a pod as having been created at least once.

name: originalPodName
desc: Returns the original pod name by removing any prefix and suffix.

name: podProviderName
desc: Gets the name of a pod with the appended pod provider prefix.

name: registerDisposableHandler
desc: Registers a disposable handler for a pod that requires destruction callbacks.

name: registerScope
desc: Registers a new scope with the given name.

name: removeSingletonIfCreated
desc: Removes a singleton pod if it has been created.

name: requiresDestruction
desc: Checks if a pod requires destruction.

name: resetPodProcessorCache
desc: Resets the pod processor cache, clearing all cached post-processors.

name: setApplicationStartup
desc:
Defines a contract for components that are aware of and can interact with
an ApplicationStartup strategy.

name: setCachePodMetadata
desc: Enables or disables caching of pod metadata for performance optimization.

name: setConversionService
desc: Sets an assigned ConversionService.

name: setParentFactory
desc: Sets the parent factory for this hierarchical factory.

name: setPodExpressionResolver
desc: Sets the expression resolver for resolving expressions in pod definitions.

name: transformedPodName
desc: Transforms a pod name by removing any prefix and suffix.

desc: Retrieves the PodProvider backing a pod.

desc: Retrieves the PodProvider backing a pod.

name: POD_PROVIDER_CLASS
desc: The PodProvider class reference for internal usage.

name: addSingleton
desc: Add the given singleton object to the singleton cache of this factory.

name: addSingletonCallback
desc: Add a callback to be executed when the singleton associated with name is initialized.

name: afterSingletonCreation
desc: Callback after singleton creation.

name: beforeSingletonCreation
desc: Callback before singleton creation.

name: clearSingletonCache
desc: Clear all cached singleton instances in this registry.

name: containsSingleton
desc: Returns true if this registry contains a pod with the given name.

name: destroyDependentPods
desc: Destroy all pods that depend on the specified pod.

name: destroyPod
desc: Destroy the given pod.

name: destroySingleton
desc: Destroy the given pod. Delegates to destroyPod if a corresponding disposable pod instance is found.

name: destroySingletons
desc: Destroy all singleton pods in this registry.

name: doGetSingleton
desc: Get the singleton instance for the given name.

name: getDependenciesForPod
desc: Return the names of all pods that the specified pod depends on, if any.

name: getDependentPods
desc: Return the names of all pods which depend on the specified pod, if any.

name: getNullableProviderObject
desc: Returns the cached raw object for a provider-managed pod, if present.

name: getPodProvider
desc: Retrieves the PodProvider backing a pod.

name: getProviderObject
desc:
Retrieves the object managed by a PodProvider, applying caching
and optional post-processing semantics.

name: getSingleton
desc: Retrieve the pod registered under name.

name: getSingletonClass
desc: Return the class of the specified singleton pod, if any.

name: getSingletonCount
desc: Returns the total number of pods registered.

name: getSingletonNames
desc: Returns a list of all pod names currently registered.

name: hasDependentPod
desc: Determine whether a dependent pod has been registered for the given name.

name: isActuallyInCreation
desc: Check whether the specified singleton pod is actually in creation.

name: isCurrentlyCreatingSingleton
desc: Check whether the specified singleton pod is currently in creation.

name: isCurrentlyInCreation
desc: Check whether the specified singleton pod is currently in creation.

name: isDependent
desc:
Determine whether the specified dependent pod has been registered as
dependent on the given pod or on any of its transitive dependencies.

name: onSuppressedException
desc: Handle a suppressed exception.

desc: Retrieves the PodProvider backing a pod.

desc: Register a containment relationship between two pods.

name: registerDependentPod

name: registerSingleton
desc: Register a new pod under the given name.

name: removeSingleton
desc: Remove the pod associated with name.

name: setCurrentlyInCreation
desc: Set the specified singleton pod as currently in creation.

name: singletonCallbacks
desc: Map of singleton callbacks: pod name to Consumer.

name: AliasRegistry
desc: An abstract interface for managing name aliases in a registry system.

desc: Retrieves the primary name associated with the given alias.

name: getAliases
desc: Retrieves all aliases registered for the given primary name.

desc: Checks whether the given name is registered as an alias.

desc: Removes an alias from the registry.

desc: Contract for objects that support alias registration.

desc: Registers an alias for an existing name in the registry.

name: ApplicationStartup
desc: Instruments the application startup phase using StartupSteps.

Defines a contract for components that are aware of and can interact with
an ApplicationStartup strategy.

desc:
Defines a contract for components that are aware of and can interact with

desc:
Defines a contract for components that are aware of and can interact with

Holder for a constructor argument value, including its optional type

Holder for a constructor argument value, including its optional type
and name metadata.

desc: Creates a deep copy of this ArgumentValue.

Normalized argument list, where each argument is wrapped in

The AutowireMode used for this component.

desc: The hash code for this object.

desc: Numeric representation of the mode for easier serialization or mapping.

desc: Returns the AutowireMode that matches the given name.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

desc: Adds a generic argument value.

desc: Clears all argument values (both indexed and generic).

desc:
Creates a deep copy of this ConstructorArgumentValues, preserving
all ArgumentValues and their states.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

Retrieves the first generic argument value matching the requiredType,

A no-op implementation of ApplicationStartup that always returns

Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses to resolve

Defines the type of dependency validation to be performed when initializing
a component or system.

desc: Returns the DependencyCheck that matches the given name.

name: values

name: DependencyDescriptor
desc: Describes a dependency required by a component or pod.

name: DependencyDescriptor.new
desc: Describes a dependency required by a component or pod.

name: args
desc: The arguments to pass to the constructor of the dependency.

name: component
desc: The component type of the dependency.

name: isEager
desc: Whether the dependency should be resolved eagerly.

name: isRequired

name: key
desc: The key type of the dependency.

name: lookup
desc: The lookup name of the dependency.

name: podName
desc: The name of the pod that has the dependency.

name: propertyName
desc: The name of the property or parameter that requires the dependency.

name: source
desc: The source of the dependency (where the dependency is needed).

name: type
desc: The type of the dependency that needs to be resolved.

desc: Creates a deep copy of this PropertyValue.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getName
desc: The name of the property.

name: isOptional
desc: Whether the property is optional. Defaults to false.

name: PropertyValues
desc: Interface for accessing a collection of PropertyValue objects.

name: changesSince
desc:
Computes the set of properties that differ compared to another old
PropertyValues.

name: contains
desc: Returns true if a property with the given value exists.

name: containsProperty
desc: Returns true if a property with the given propertyName exists.

name: getPropertyValue
desc: Retrieves a property by its propertyName, or null if not found.

name: getPropertyValues
desc: Returns all property values as an unmodifiable list.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether the collection has no properties.

name: RootPodDefinition
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractPodDefinition that serves as
the default pod definition in the system.

name: RootPodDefinition.from
desc:
Creates a new RootPodDefinition by copying the state of another
AbstractPodDefinition.

name: RootPodDefinition.new
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractPodDefinition that serves as
the default pod definition in the system.

name: clone
desc: Creates and returns a deep clone of this pod definition.

name: ScopeDesign
desc: Describes the scope configuration of a component.

name: ScopeDesign.new
desc:
Creates a ScopeDesign with the given type,
isSingleton, and isPrototype flags.

name: ScopeDesign.type
desc: Creates a ScopeDesign with the given type flag.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isPrototype
desc: Whether the scope is prototype.

name: isSingleton
desc: Whether the scope is singleton.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: type
desc:
The ScopeType of this descriptor.
See Defines the lifecycle scope of a component within a dependency injection
container.

name: ScopeNotActiveException
desc: Exception thrown when a pod is requested from a scope that is not active.

name: ScopeNotActiveException.new
desc: Exception thrown when a pod is requested from a scope that is not active.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ScopeType
desc:
Defines the lifecycle scope of a component within a dependency injection
container.

name: fromValue
desc: Returns the ScopeType that corresponds to the given integer value.

name: value
desc: Numeric representation of the scope type.

name: valueOf
desc: Returns the ScopeType that matches the given name.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ScopedObjectFactory
desc: An ObjectFactory implementation that retrieves objects from a specific PodScope.

name: ScopedObjectFactory.new
desc: An ObjectFactory implementation that retrieves objects from a specific PodScope.

name: copyWithScope
desc: Creates a copy of this ScopedObjectFactory with optional modifications.

name: fallbackFactory
desc: The fallback factory used to create the object if it doesn't exist in the scope.

name: get
desc: Returns an instance of the object managed by this factory.

name: getPodName
desc: Returns the pod name used by this factory.

name: name
desc: The name of the pod to retrieve or create in the scope.

name: removeFromScope
desc: Removes the object from the scope if it exists.

name: scope
desc: The pod scope from which to retrieve or register the object.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this ScopedObjectFactory.

name: SimpleAliasRegistry
desc: A thread-safe implementation of AliasRegistry using LocalThread storage.

name: SimpleAliasRegistry.new
desc: A thread-safe implementation of AliasRegistry using LocalThread storage.

name: aliasCount
desc: Returns the number of registered aliases for the current thread.

name: allowAliasOverriding
desc: Determine whether alias overriding is allowed.

name: checkForAliasCircle
desc:
Check whether the given name points back to the given alias as an alias
in the other direction already, catching a circular reference.

name: clear
desc: Clears all alias registrations for the current thread.

name: getAlias
desc: Retrieves the primary name associated with the given alias.

name: getAliasNames
desc: Returns all registered aliases as an unmodifiable view for the current thread.

name: getAliases
desc: Retrieves all aliases registered for the given primary name.

name: getUltimateNames
desc: Returns all registered target names as an unmodifiable view for the current thread.

name: hasAlias
desc: Determine whether the given name has the given alias registered.

name: isAlias
desc: Checks whether the given name is registered as an alias.

name: isEmpty
desc: Returns true if no aliases are registered for the current thread.

name: isNotEmpty
desc: Returns true if aliases are registered for the current thread.

name: registerAlias
desc: Registers an alias for an existing name in the registry.

name: removeAlias
desc: Removes an alias from the registry.

name: resolveAliases
desc:
Resolve all alias target names and aliases registered in this registry,
applying the given StringValueResolver to them.

name: targetName
desc: Determine the target name, resolving aliases to their ultimate target.

name: threadLocalAliasMap
desc: Gets the thread-local alias map for testing or advanced use cases.

name: threadLocalAliasNames
desc: Gets the thread-local alias names list for testing or advanced use cases.

name: SimpleObjectFactory
desc: Default implementation of the ObjectFactory interface that uses a creator function.

name: SimpleObjectFactory.new
desc: Default implementation of the ObjectFactory interface that uses a creator function.

name: creator
desc: The creator function that produces new instances of type T.

name: get
desc: Returns an instance of the object managed by this factory.

name: SimplePodDefinitionRegistry
desc: A basic registry for managing pod definitions.

name: SimplePodDefinitionRegistry.new
desc: A basic registry for managing pod definitions.

name: containsDefinition
desc: Returns true if this registry contains a pod with the given name.

name: getDefinition
desc: Retrieve the pod registered under name.

name: getDefinitionByClass
desc: Returns the pod definition for the specified class type.

name: getDefinitionNames
desc: Returns a list of all pod names currently registered.

name: getNumberOfPodDefinitions
desc: Returns the total number of pods registered.

name: isNameInUse
desc: Returns true if name is currently in use in this registry.

name: registerDefinition
desc: Register a new pod under the given name.

name: removeDefinition
desc: Remove the pod associated with name.

name: SimplePodNameGenerator
desc: Default implementation of the PodNameGenerator interface.

name: SimplePodNameGenerator.new
desc: Default implementation of the PodNameGenerator interface.

name: generate
desc: Strategy interface for generating pod names for PodDefinitions.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: SingletonPodRegistry
desc: Interface for registries that hold singleton pod instances.

name: addSingletonCallback
desc: Add a callback to be executed when the singleton associated with name is initialized.

name: clearSingletonCache
desc: Clears all cached singleton pods.

name: containsSingleton
desc: Returns true if this registry contains a pod with the given name.

name: getSingleton
desc: Retrieve the pod registered under name.

name: getSingletonCount
desc: Returns the total number of pods registered.

name: getSingletonNames
desc: Returns a list of all pod names currently registered.

name: registerSingleton
desc: Register a new pod under the given name.

name: removeSingleton
desc: Remove the pod associated with name.

name: SmartInitializingSingleton
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: onSingletonReady
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: StandardStartupTracker
desc: Standard implementation of the {@macro startup} interface.

name: getAction
desc:
Returns a string representation of the startup action,
such as 'ApplicationContext refreshed' or 'JetLeaf ready'.

name: getProcessUptime
desc:
Returns the current process uptime in milliseconds since the
application start time, or null if unsupported.

name: getStartTime
desc:
Returns the system timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) at which
the application startup began.

name: StartupStep
desc:
Step recording metrics about a particular phase or action happening during
the ApplicationStartup.

name: end
desc: Marks the end of this step.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: id
desc: A unique identifier assigned to this step.

name: name
desc: The technical name of the startup step.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: parentId
desc: ID of the parent step, if available.

name: tag
desc: Attaches a static key/value tag to this step.

name: tags
desc: Returns the complete list of StartupStepTags associated with this step.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: StartupStepTag
desc: Attaches a static key/value tag to this step.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: key
desc: The key associated with this tag, such as pod.name, phase, etc.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value associated with this tag.

name: StartupStepTags
desc: Returns the complete list of StartupStepTags associated with this step.

name: StartupTracker
desc: Represents a startup lifecycle monitor for JetLeaf-based applications.

name: create
desc: Creates a new instance of StartupTracker.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAction
desc:
Returns a string representation of the startup action,
such as 'ApplicationContext refreshed' or 'JetLeaf ready'.

name: getProcessUptime
desc:
Returns the current process uptime in milliseconds since the
application start time, or null if unsupported.

name: getReady
desc: Returns the current time elapsed since the application began starting.

name: getStartTime
desc:
Returns the system timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) at which
the application startup began.

name: getTimeTakenToStarted
desc: Returns the time it took to reach the started() state.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: started
desc:
Marks the application as "started" and calculates the duration
since getStartTime().

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: StringValueResolver
desc: Interface for resolving string values to their actual values.

name: resolve
desc: Resolve the given String value, for example resolving placeholders.

name: UnsatisfiedDependencyException
desc: Exception thrown when a dependency is not satisfied for a pod.

name: UnsatisfiedDependencyException.withResource
desc: Exception thrown when a dependency is not satisfied for a pod.
